meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: U.S. Revises Microsoft Plan The Justice Department filed a modified version of its original proposal to break Microsoft into two companies. The modifications include small changes.
Teacher Killed in School A Florida seventh-grader shot and killed a teacher on the last day of school after being sent home for throwing water balloons in class, the police said.
U.S. Revises Microsoft Plan The Justice Department filed a modified version of its original proposal to break Microsoft into two companies. The modifications include small changes.
Teacher Killed in School A Florida seventh-grader shot and killed a teacher on the last day of school after being sent home for throwing water balloons in class, the police said.
China Vote, Local Politics The House approval of a China trade bill was no new affirmation of internationalism, but a reaffirmation of an old truth: Members vote their districts. News Analysis.
Wilderness Debate in Alaska In southeast Alaska, there is a growing debate over the need to build more logging roads in the Tongass National Forest.
F.B.I. Director Investigated The Justice Department briefly investigated accusations that the director of the F.B.I., Louis J. Freeh, had lied to Congress.
Lakers Edge Trail Blazers The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Portland Trail Blazers, 93-91, and lead the Western Conference finals 2-1.
